verbs.description: something unexpected [V: has] been happening to plants in the arctic as it gets warmer the plants of the arctic typically very low - lying shrubs are getting taller as the region warms up because of climate change new research has revealed existing plant species are growing in height and taller plants are moving into the neighbourh europe plants colorado iceland arctic germany alps northern hemisphere canada anne d bjorkman university of edinburgh senckenberg biodiversity and climate research centre ellesmere island bbc dryas integrifolia sweden isla myers - smith uk mountain avens european alps anne d bjorkman
